Name: Weihnachtslieder von Komponistinnen Band 4
Notes: Collection of Christmas songs by female composers from America, Germany, France, and the Netherlands. Includes works by Amy Marcy Beach, Luise Greger, Fémine Schults, Luise Reichardt, Augusta Holmès, Bettine von Arnim, Annette von Droste-Hülshoff, and Emilie Zumsteeg.
Long Description: This volume is part of a collection featuring Christmas songs composed by women from various countries. It includes a variety of styles and musical expressions, accompanied by piano. The collection also comes with a CD (SAL 7018) featuring recordings of these songs.
Short Description: A collection of Christmas songs by female composers for mezzo soprano and piano.
